flawed_nl_solution:
He has 20 white marbles because 100 x 0.2 = <<100*0.2=20>>20
He has 30 black marbles because 100 x 0.3 = <<100*0.3=30>>30
He has 50 color marbles because 100 - 20 - 30 = <<100-20-30=50>>50
He earns $1 from white marbles because 20 x 0.05 = <<20*0.05=1>>1
He earns $3 from the black marbles because 30 x 0.1 = <<30*0.1=3>>3
He earns $10 from the colors because 50 x 0.2 = <<50*0.2=10>>10
He earns $17 in total because 1 + 3 + 10 = <<1+3+10=17>>17
#### 17

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 14, not 17. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
